casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Poindexter, Appellant.
Submitted September 27, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
George 0. Bewail and Gordon C. Post, Jr., for appellant.
James A. Caldwell, Assistant District Attorney, and W. Thomas Andrews, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 20, 1971:
